Description: 2-day hackathon for IoT SMEs to engage with organisations about IoT solutions

Description: Data and Startup Summit

Title: Hack For Impact
Description: Exploring the possibility of building a Yorkshire-wide 'dashboard' to measure impact

Description: Making sure GovTech tools and resources are developed in the open, shared, re-used and improved by the input and experience of everyone.

Title: #PlanetData
Description: #PlanetData aims to help the challenge of the climate crisis by encouraging organisations to work in the open, share their data, let others reach in and help improve the overall outcome.

Description: Using open data and open innovation to better understand the coronavirus crisis and help guide us into a post-pandemic world.

Description: Keeping the Climate Emergency in focus during the coronavirus pandemic.

Title: Northernlands 2
Description: "Follow up event to the hugely successful first Northernlands event

Description: Hackathon to explore the affects of air quality on health, and how it can be tackled in the context of the Climate Emergency.

Description: Continuing the conversations and sharing more good work in the context of the Climate Emergency.

Title: Northernlands 3
Description: Follow up to our previous Northernlands events

Title: Powered Up
Description: Events to discuss open data in the energy sector

Title: UK Data Landscape
Description: What is a 'data landscape' and what does it look like? This ODI-led project applies our rapid open innovation methods to gather input about who/what should be included in the landscape combined with The Data City machine-learning platform to develop an initial snapshot.

Title: River Data: Wharfe
Description: Exploring new and existing data that could help reduce sewer discharges on the river Wharfe

Title: #PlanetData4
Description: Our fourth installment details projects and initiatives that our friends, sponsors and partners are working on NOW that can be actioned to work towards net zero.

Title: #OpenDataSavesLives Unconference
Description: An Unconference for Open Data Saves Lives - helping healthcare make more evidence-based decisions by sharing data, sharing code and sharing learning.

Title: Levelling Up
Description: A project to explore 'levelling up' from a Northern perspective, by working in the open, inviting discussion and suggestions, and developing a prototype visualisation with open data at its foundation.

Title: Northernlands 4
Description: The fourth installment of our event which brings together connectors, start-ups, and innovators from across the North of England and the Netherlands. This took place on 26th/27th April 2022 as part of Leeds Digital Festival 2022.

Title: Open Data Saves Lives Unconference 2
Description: OpenDataSavesLives is driving open innovation with data Our aim is to help reduce inequalities by creating for the first time a true network of collaborators and resources in the open

Title: Northern Economic Data User Group
Description: We're seeking to build a network of willing collaborators who will share their experiences, their research, their code, their data and their expertise to advance economic research and understanding across North England.

Title: #PlanetData5
Description: In this event we focused on how we plan for and manage real time response to changing climate for major infrastructure communications with People & Customers who may be vulnerable & also assisting Primary Care response

Title: Open Data Saves Lives
Description: Our continuing events series to convene and collaborate to help the NHS use open data to address Health Inequalities

Title: Leeds Data Ethics Forum
Description: Working with DLA Piper we are hosting the Leeds Data Ethics Forum to build initiative in this area to work on making Leeds a leading Safe Digital City

Title: Net Zero: Hack For Impact
Description: We're working with Northern Powergrid in their ambition to support our region to meet its decarbonisaton pledge.
